# insertArrangedSubview(_:at:)

**Instance Method**

Adds a view as an arranged split pane at the specified index.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func insertArrangedSubview(_ view: NSView, at index: Int)
```

## Discussion

If the view is already an arranged view, calling this method moves the view to the specified index in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSplitView/arrangedSubviews] array. This change doesn’t affect the view’s index in the split view’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/subviews] array.

If the view isn’t a subview of the split view, calling this method adds it to the split view’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/subviews] array.

## Arranging Subviews

- **arrangesAllSubviews**: A Boolean value that determines whether the split view arranges all of its subviews as split panes.
- **arrangedSubviews**: The array of views that the split view arranges as its split panes.
- **addArrangedSubview(_:)**: Adds a view as an arranged split pane.
- **removeArrangedSubview(_:)**: Removes a view as an arranged split pane.
